titleStmt.title: Weighty queries relating to the past, present, and future state of Ireland calculated for the present and future benefit of that unhappy kingdom. And tendred to the serious consideration of all who are willing to be inform'd how it became unhappy, and how it may yet be made happy again to posterity.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
